title: Power property
text: If a is a real number, and $$m$$ and $$n$$ are whole numbers, then $${\left(a^m\right)}^n=a^{m n}$$. To raise a power to a power, multiply the exponents.

title: Exponents with numbers
text: Raise each variable and number to the power of $$3$$.

title: Answer
text: Using the power property to simplify the powers in the variables results in $$-1000q^6 p^{12}$$.
